original_title: 夫の上司に飾られた 人妻ボディアクセサリー 木下凛々子
overview: Tomoya and Ririko work for a global jewelry sales company. The two got married and still work together. One day, Tomoya lost a rare accessory for display. While the company is in turmoil, Tomoya's boss, Oshita, invites his wife, Ririko, to say, "If you help me with my work, I will keep quiet." She agrees, even though Ririko harbors her misgivings. But... that job is to make Ririko wear her body accessories. And her purpose is to play with Ririko who is writhing in her shame...
title: I Was Dressed By My Husband’s Boss Married Woman Body Accessories Ririko Kinoshita
